name: Palette Swap (SuperCitrus)
description:
Palette Swap is an action platformer inspired by the Super Game Boy accessory for the Super Nintendo, allowing you to swap 4 color palettes on the fly during gameplay. However, the palette will change the environment around you as well, requiring constant swapping to get through the game. What you see here is a test demo of the game's airdash mechanic and movement system, taking place in the green palette. Color swapping and full levels will be added very soon, but until then I would love to gather feedback about how the main character handles. The game has a tutorial screen but just in case here are the controls:

Movement: WASD, Analog Stick, or DPAD

Jump: P, Space, A (or Equivalent) on Controller

Dash: O, Left Shift, X (or Equivalent) on Controller

Restart Demo: R, Select (or Equivalent) on Controller (NOTE: PS button for PS4 controllers)

Fullscreen: Ctrl + F or Alt + Enter

If you have feedback for the game, questions, or just want to hang out, join our official Discord!
